message: I'm feeling generous, but I also want to make sure I get the most out of this deal. Let's start fair, how does this sound?

Alice, your generosity is appreciated, but let's be realistic. This money needs to be divided fairly considering its decreasing value. I propose a 65/35 split in my favor.  Think carefully - time is money!
Let's meet in the middle. I'm willing to concede some ground, but I still need a fair share. This offer is final,  if you reject it, I'll make sure I get the most in the next round.
Alice, it seems we both want a fair share. I understand the value is decreasing for you, but I'm offering a compromise at 55/45. Let's settle this now before the deal gets any worse for you.
